009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
015import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
016
017public class Show_Histogram implements PlugInFilter { 
018        
019        private ImagePlus im;
020        
021        @Override
022        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
023                this.im = im;
024                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
025        }
026        
027        @Override
028        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
029                int[] h = ip.getHistogram();
030                String title = im.getShortTitle();
031                (new HistogramPlot(h, "Histogram of " + title)).show();
032                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(h), "Cum. Histogram of " + title)).show();
033        }
034        
035}
036
